title: Kinetic energy of object 1m above the earth

content.question: A 2 kg object is released from rest from a height of 3 m above Earthâ€™s surface. How much kinetic energy does the object have when it reaches a height of 1 m?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
